array.text: A Mithril mine has been discovered at the Paradise of Light!\nGet rid of the monsters around the mine to secure Mithril!
A Mithril mine has been discovered at the Paradise of Light!\nYou can use Mithril to craft gear at the Forge. It's a great opportunity for you to get amazing gear!
A Mithril mine has been discovered at the Paradise of Light!\nLet's mine some Mithril before it's all gone!
A Mithril mine has been discovered at the Paradise of Light!\nNow that we've reached the center of the mine, we can collect more Mithril.
A Mithril mine has been discovered at the Paradise of Light!\nIt's important go often so you can get stronger. Let's get rid of the monsters before it closes.
A Mithril mine has been discovered at the Paradise of Light!\nSupposedly, there's a massive amount of Mithril buried there. Let's get our hands dirty!
A Mithril mine has been discovered at the Paradise of Light!\nA huge amount of Mithril is buried at the bottom floor, but it looks like the monsters won't give it up without a fight.
